item.title: Mann-Whitney test is not just a test of medians: differences in spread can be important
item.description: Reference A Hart “Mann-Whitney test is not just a test of medians: differences in spread can be important” (2001) // BMJ. Vol. 323. No 7309. Pp. 391–393.
